attributes.action: Pay ALL 1950s Women State Pension Now & Create 1000s of Jobs for Younger People
attributes.additional_details:
*Create 1000s of jobs for younger people, reduce unemployment
*1950s women can retire with dignity
*Take 1000s of 1950s women out of poverty
*Give 1000s of 1950s women not eligible for benefits an income
*Take 1000s 1950s women & younger people off benefits
*Take 1000s of 1950s women & younger people off Job Seekers Allowance
The petition mustn't prevent groups continue to campaign for compensation/full restitution etc
A parliament debate helps the PM keep his promise to look at this issue again
attributes.background:
This will benefit many people in different ways including:
*Stop forcing 1950s women to seek employment or retraining, give freedom to choose to retire & free up 1000s of job opportunities for younger people
*More available income for 1950s women to spend, to help the economy recover from Covid-19

rejection.details: As you seem concerned about the state pension age, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302965.
